title: Is it worth reading pesu notes for physics?

comments.body: Yes 100 perc, infact reading notes for every sub is worth it..
Do AV summary + pesu notes. These 2 things alone helped me score well in phy

absolutely the fuck not, its a waste of your time.

Do Faisal Sir's 727 Slides (all 4 units), you'll get an A or even an S
Yeah these 700 slides are more than enough
hard vouch, don't know why bro is getting downvoted, i did faisal sir's slides and the numericals he gives after every topic in the slides itself and got A grade in physics
Notes are very useful for unit 3 & 4 imo. For Unit 1 and 2, faisal sir's notes are more than enough.

exactly man :( 

some people just love studying the subject in depth, in reality you need to study the subject well enough to score marks, not frfr delve deep into it
Those 727 includes welcome and thank u  slides 'JESUSFUCKIGCRIST' is most efficient way to read physics (at least for me)
